name: DJ Jubilee
description: '''Jerome Temple''', professionally known as '''DJ Jubilee''', also known as “The King of Bounce”, is an American [[Rapping|rapper]] from [[New Orleans]], [[Louisiana]].  Considered a pioneer in the [[bounce music]] scene with several regional hit records such as "Stop Pause (Do the Jubilee All)", he is often credited for influencing the music genre's sound, catchphrases (such as 'twerk'), and dances.
